long_description: The REI Trail 25 pack transitions smoothly between your trail and urban activities. It's designed for comfort, effective organization and easy access to your gear. 25-liter design has a panel-loading main compartment to hold your essentials and includes a sleeve for a hydration reservoir (not included). Front pocket features a key-keeper clip and an organizer for compass, lip balm, wallet, sunglasses and other small essentials. Side mesh pockets create convenient storage and on-the-go access to water bottle, sunscreen, snacks or small electronics. Side compression straps let you cinch down loads for jostle-free carrying; clip loop acommodates an LED blinker light. Foam-padded, curved shoulder straps with soft edges and padded back panel deliver carrying comfort for long days on the trail. Removable hipbelt and sternum strap let you customize the pack to your needs. REI Trail 25 Pack features durable recycled PET fabric for years of heavy use. Special buy.
short_description: The REI Trail 25 pack transitions smoothly between your trail and urban activities. It's designed for comfort, effective organization and easy access to your gear.
